controllers

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.AdminController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogoutEvent

    public class AdminController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogoutEvent
    This class controls the administrator subsystem represented by admin.fxml. Handles the list of all users in the subsystem. Implements LogoutEvent.
    Author:
    Derek Schatel

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage mainstage)
        Sets up the initial admin list view.

      • accountDetailDisplay

        private void accountDetailDisplay()
        Handles dynamic display of selected user account information.

      • buttonHandling

        private void buttonHandling()
        Handles interaction with Add and Delete user buttons. Add user prompts the user with a dialog box to provide a username, password and full account name. Delete user prompts the user with a confirmation dialog box for deleting the selected user from the list.
